entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
